attributes.action: Abolish the payment for prescriptions for 60+ yrs old
attributes.additional_details: People In Wales and Scotland get free prescriptions and people over 60 now might have to wait till they receive their pension at 65+ why are we subsidising the Scottish an Welsh for them to get theirs free?
attributes.background: Abolish plans for charging 60yr olds for prescriptions until there 65

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594390
